Articles.Content: In the next updates i hope the Devs add more colony base pieces to the game and more solar systems. Because I really like to go to other planets and build bases there for my kerbins. But there are just so few colony pieces that its hard so i got a mod, but that kinda slows my ksp down so in the next update i hope the devs add a more expansive colony system. As well more places to colonize i know we have eve but I've been there so many times its just gotten old and again in the next big update I hope they add a completely new solar system.

The problem is, if squad keeps adding stuff for everyone, for instance for you, is slows the game to. A mod doesn't slow down ksp, but a part and sripts. So if the Dev's add some new parts or/and scripts, it eventually will slow the game too, maybe a bit less than mods.

And there are so many people who want new features in KSP, but I think the Dev's want to keep the game basic and simple. If I want something extra added to my game, I just mod it and I'm a happy man  It doesn't matter for me if its a mod or stock. 

Another fact is that the dev's focus on the stock game while updating, fixing bugs etc. While modmakers focus on their mods in their freetime. If dev's make to much 'stock', they have to maintain much more and updates will be bigger.  

Ofcourse some things can be added, but I think squad will keep the game quite simple so it doesn't get to complicated.
